title: Out of the Darkness
description: The honeymoon is over...  Real life must begin and it is here, in Bria and Jonahâ€™s married life, that Bria discovers the strength her friends always knew she had. Along with some of their friends, Bria and Jonah leave their home and family in North Carolina, and travel toward DC in hopes of finding East and bringing her home.Meanwhile, East longs for home, peace, and safety as she perseveres in her mission to save the country. Haz remains by her side and his devotion challenges her to acknowledge the wounds of the past and the fears of the present. In this truth, healing for both of them begins.A nation is saved. Friends are lost. Futures are discovered. All questions are answered in this climactic ending to The Light Series.
author: Jacqueline Brown
